tool.name: Assembly Statistics
tool.description: Calculate common measures of assembly quality

param.name: minLength
param.label: Minimum length of contigs to consider

tool.help:
**What it does**
Reports standard measures of *de novo* assembly quality such as number of contigs, sum of contigs, mean contig length, and N50.
**Parameter list**
Minimum length Only include contigs of this size or greater for calculating statistics.
**Output**
Num contigs Total number of contigs in the assembly
Sum of contig lengths Total sum of contig lengths
Maximum contig length Maximum of the contig lengths
Mean contig length Average contig length
N50 Contig length at which 50% of the assembly is contained in contigs of this size or greater.
99% Number of contigs accounting for 99% of the observed assembly.
